article_title: Greece Seals Deal for Lower Natural Gas Prices
article_text:
ATHENS—Greece sealed a deal with Russian energy company OAO Gazprom, slashing the price of natural gas to the country and providing much-needed breathing space for Greece's crisis-hit industries, the energy ministry announced Tuesday.

The agreement between Greece's natural gas distributor DEPA and the Russian giant offers a 15% price cut and takes effect retroactively, from July last year, the announcement said. It extends a current...
